Introduction

Roa (also stylized as ROA or RoA), formerly known as Jieun.K, is a South Korean singer-songwriter under Gogeum Music. She is a member of the co-ed band Someilsang.

She is the former Leader and Main Vocalist of girl group X:in and a former member of the upcoming girl group MEP-C formed through the training platform Universe. She is also a former pre-debut member of the girl group DAILY.

She made her solo debut on April 24, 2017, with the digital single "Red Lips". On September 2, 2023, she signed a contract with Gogeum Entertainment.
